title: Mario dos Santos Júnior
text:
Mario dos Santos Júnior or simply Junior (born 27 October 1971) is a former <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>ian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Junior and <a href="Lu%C3%ADs%20Andr%C3%A9%20da%20Silva">Luís André da Silva</a> were the first Brazilian players in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20Premier%20League">Russian Football Premier League</a> when they joined <a href="FC%20Lokomotiv%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod</a> in 1995.
